info.title: Statements API
info.description: Provides CRUD operations on the statement resource.

get.description: GetStatement retrieves a specific statement, specified by its ID.

400.description: Returned when the request body is malformatted or does not match the expected request.

401.description: Returned when the request does not contains the user's credentials.

403.description: Returned when the user does not have permission to access the resource.

404.description: Returned when the resource is not found.

500.description: Returned when an unexpected error occured on the server side.

parameters.name: iD
parameters.description: ID is the unique identifier of the statement

result.description: Result is a list containing the statement.

has_more.description: HasMore indicates if there are more statement available.

statementsGetStatementsResponse.title: GetStatementResponse is the response envelope for retrieving

id.description: ID is the unique identifier of a statement.

status.description: Status is the status of the statement.

date.description: Date is the date of the statement.

description.description: Description is the description of the statement.

amount.description: Amount is the amount if the transcation that writes on the statement.

balance.description: Balance is remaining balance after related transaction.

statementsStatement.description: Statement holds details regarding a customer's statement.

statementsStatus.description:
Status define the status of a statment.

 - Received: Status_Received is the value for a received statment.
 - Pending: Status_Pending is the value for a pending statement.

cur.description: Cur is the currency of the amount.

num.description: Num is the value of the amount.

OAuth2.description: Access to statement resources is restricted to authenticated users. The authentication process follows the Authorization Code flow.
